name: Come on in to my secret base in the woods with ink answers…le freak!
name_original: Come on in to my secret base in the woods with ink answers…le freak!
description:
This is a puzzle game, you’ll need to slide the button to change the exposure, try to find the clue from the transition between white and black, and find out the hidden secret.

The game is for global game jam 2022, the theme is duality. The duality we want to express is both through the visual art and the narrative.

Hope you enjoy it.
